Class ReloadingKeyStoreFileSpi

java.lang.Object
java.security.KeyStoreSpi
keystore_tutorial.DelegatingKeyStoreSpi
keystore_tutorial.ReloadingKeyStoreFileSpi
public class ReloadingKeyStoreFileSpi extends DelegatingKeyStoreSpi
KeyStoreSpi implementation that hot-reloads KeyStore when the backing file changes.
